verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֡ה <WH859> you הַקְרֵ֣ב <WH7126> And take אֵלֶיךָ֩ <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> thou unto thee Aaron אָחִ֜יךָ <WH251> thy brother וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֣יו <WH1121> and his sons אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> from מִתּ֛וֹךְ <WH8432> with him from among בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <WH3547> that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִ֑י אַהֲרֹ֕ן <WH175> [even] Aaron נָדָ֧ב <WH5070> Nadab וַאֲבִיה֛וּא <WH30> and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <WH499> Eleazar וְאִיתָמָ֖ר <WH385> and Ithamar בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> sons אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> Aaron's

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make בִגְדֵי־ <WH899> garments קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> holy לְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> for Aaron אָחִ֑יךָ <WH251> thy brother לְכָב֖וֹד <WH3519> for glory וּלְתִפְאָֽרֶת׃ <WH8597> and for beauty

וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> You תְּדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> And thou shalt speak אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all חַכְמֵי־ <WH2450> unto all [that are] wise לֵ֔ב <WH3820> hearted אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom מִלֵּאתִ֖יו <WH4390> whom I have filled ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> with the spirit חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> of wisdom וְעָשׂ֞וּ <WH6213> that they may make אֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְדֵ֧י <WH899> garments אַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> Aaron's לְקַדְּשׁ֖וֹ <WH6942> to consecrate לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <WH3547> him that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> These הַבְּגָדִ֜ים <WH899> And these [are] the garments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יַעֲשׂ֗וּ <WH6213> which they shall make חֹ֤שֶׁן <WH2833> a breastplate וְאֵפוֹד֙ <WH646> and an ephod וּמְעִ֔יל <WH4598> and a robe וּכְתֹ֥נֶת <WH3801> coat תַּשְׁבֵּ֖ץ <WH8665> and a broidered מִצְנֶ֣פֶת <WH4701> a mitre וְאַבְנֵ֑ט <WH73> and a girdle וְעָשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> and they shall make בִגְדֵי־ <WH899> garments קֹ֜דֶשׁ <WH6944> holy לְאַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> for Aaron אָחִ֛יךָ <WH251> thy brother וּלְבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> and his sons לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <WH3547> that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃

וְהֵם֙ <WH1992> They יִקְח֣וּ <WH3947> And they shall take אֶת־ <WH853> הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> gold וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַתְּכֵ֖לֶת <WH8504> and blue וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאַרְגָּמָ֑ן <WH713> and purple וְאֶת־ <WH853> תּוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֖י <WH8144> and the scarlet וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשֵּֽׁשׁ׃ <WH8336> and fine linen פ

וְעָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> And they shall make אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵפֹ֑ד <WH646> the ephod זָ֠הָב <WH2091> [of] gold תְּכֵ֨לֶת <WH8504> [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֜ן <WH713> and [of] purple תּוֹלַ֧עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֛י <WH8144> scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָ֖ר <WH7806> and fine twined מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> work חֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH2803> with cunning

שְׁתֵּ֧י <WH8147> It shall have the two כְתֵפֹ֣ת <WH3802> shoulderpieces חֹֽבְרֹ֗ת <WH2266> thereof joined יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> shall have לּ֛וֹ אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> at the two קְצוֹתָ֖יו <WH7098> edges וְחֻבָּֽר׃ <WH2266> thereof and [so] it shall be joined together

וְחֵ֤שֶׁב <WH2805> And the curious girdle אֲפֻדָּתוֹ֙ <WH642> of the ephod אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֖הוּ <WH4639> which [is] upon it shall be of the same according to the work מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <WH4480> of the same יִהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> become זָהָ֗ב <WH2091> thereof [even of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <WH7806> and fine twined

וְלָ֣קַחְתָּ֔ <WH3947> And thou shalt take אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֖י <WH8147> two אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> stones שֹׁ֑הַם <WH7718> onyx וּפִתַּחְתָּ֣ <WH6605> and grave עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> on שְׁמ֖וֹת <WH8034> on them the names בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

שִׁשָּׁה֙ <WH8337> Six מִשְּׁמֹתָ֔ם <WH8034> of their names עַ֖ל <WH5921> and הָאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stone הָאֶחָ֑ת <WH259> on one וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֞וֹת <WH8034> names הַשִּׁשָּׁ֧ה <WH8337> and [the other] six הַנּוֹתָרִ֛ים <WH3498> of the rest עַל־ <WH5921> and הָאֶ֥בֶן <WH68> stone הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> on the other כְּתוֹלְדֹתָֽם׃ <WH8435> according to their birth

מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> With the work חָרַשׁ֮ <WH2796> of an engraver אֶבֶן֒ <WH68> in stone פִּתּוּחֵ֣י <WH6603> [like] the engravings חֹתָ֗ם <WH2368> of a signet תְּפַתַּח֙ <WH6605> shalt thou engrave אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> the two הָאֲבָנִ֔ים <WH68> stones עַל־ <WH5921> according שְׁמֹ֖ת <WH8034> with the names בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel מֻסַבֹּ֛ת <WH4142> them to be set מִשְׁבְּצ֥וֹת <WH4865> in ouches זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> thou shalt make אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וְשַׂמְתָּ֞ <WH7760> And thou shalt put אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> the two הָאֲבָנִ֗ים <WH68> stones עַ֚ל <WH5921> on כִּתְפֹ֣ת <WH3802> upon the shoulders הָֽאֵפֹ֔ד <WH646> of the ephod אַבְנֵ֥י <WH68> [for] stones זִכָּרֹ֖ן <WH2146> of memorial לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְנָשָׂא֩ <WH5375> shall bear אַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> and Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמוֹתָ֜ם <WH8034> their names לִפְנֵ֧י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> upon his two כְתֵפָ֖יו <WH3802> shoulders לְזִכָּרֹֽן׃ <WH2146> for a memorial ס
וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make מִשְׁבְּצֹ֖ת <WH4865> ouches זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> [of] gold

וּשְׁתֵּ֤י <WH8147> And two שַׁרְשְׁרֹת֙ <WH8333> chains זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold טָה֔וֹר <WH2889> [of] pure מִגְבָּלֹ֛ת <WH4020> at the ends תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> shalt thou make אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> work עֲבֹ֑ת <WH5688> [of] wreathen וְנָתַתָּ֛ה <WH5414> them and fasten אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁרְשְׁרֹ֥ת <WH8333> chains הָעֲבֹתֹ֖ת <WH5688> the wreathen עַל־ <WH5921> on הַֽמִּשְׁבְּצֹֽת׃ <WH4865> to the ouches ס

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make חֹ֤שֶׁן <WH2833> the breastplate מִשְׁפָּט֙ <WH4941> of judgment מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> work חֹשֵׁ֔ב <WH2803> with cunning כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> after the work אֵפֹ֖ד <WH646> of the ephod תַּעֲשֶׂ֑נּוּ <WH6213> thou shalt make זָ֠הָב <WH2091> it [of] gold תְּכֵ֨לֶת <WH8504> [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֜ן <WH713> and [of] purple וְתוֹלַ֧עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֛י <WH8144> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָ֖ר <WH7806> and [of] fine twined תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> shalt thou make אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

רָב֥וּעַ <WH7251> Foursquare יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become כָּפ֑וּל <WH3717> it shall be [being] doubled זֶ֥רֶת <WH2239> a span אָרְכּ֖וֹ <WH753> [shall be] the length וְזֶ֥רֶת <WH2239> thereof and a span רָחְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7341> [shall be] the breadth

וּמִלֵּאתָ֥ <WH4390> And thou shalt set בוֹ֙ מִלֻּ֣אַת <WH4396> in it settings אֶ֔בֶן <WH68> of stones אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> [even] four טוּרִ֣ים <WH2905> rows אָ֑בֶן <WH68> of stones ט֗וּר <WH2905> [the first] row אֹ֤דֶם <WH124> [shall be] a sardius פִּטְדָה֙ <WH6357> a topaz וּבָרֶ֔קֶת <WH1304> and a carbuncle הַטּ֖וּר <WH2905> row הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> [this shall be] the first
וְהַטּ֖וּר <WH2905> row הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <WH8145> And the second נֹ֥פֶךְ <WH5306> [shall be] an emerald סַפִּ֖יר <WH5601> a sapphire וְיָהֲלֹֽם׃ <WH3095> and a diamond
וְהַטּ֖וּר <WH2905> row הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <WH7992> And the third לֶ֥שֶׁם <WH3958> a ligure שְׁב֖וֹ <WH7618> an agate וְאַחְלָֽמָה׃ <WH306> and an amethyst

וְהַטּוּר֙ <WH2905> row הָרְבִיעִ֔י <WH7243> And the fourth תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ <WH8658> a beryl וְשֹׁ֖הַם <WH7718> and an onyx וְיָשְׁפֵ֑ה <WH3471> and a jasper מְשֻׁבָּצִ֥ים <WH7660> they shall be set זָהָ֛ב <WH2091> in gold יִהְי֖וּ <WH1961> become בְּמִלּוּאֹתָֽם׃ <WH4396> in their inclosings

וְ֠הָאֲבָנִים <WH68> And the stones תִּֽהְיֶ֜יןָ <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> shall be according שְׁמֹ֧ת <WH8034> shall be with the names בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel שְׁתֵּ֥ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> ten עַל־ <WH5921> according שְׁמֹתָ֑ם <WH8034> according to their names פִּתּוּחֵ֤י <WH6603> [like] the engravings חוֹתָם֙ <WH2368> of a signet אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every one עַל־ <WH5921> according שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> with his name תִּֽהְיֶ֕יןָ <WH1961> become לִשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten שָֽׁבֶט׃ <WH7626> tribes

וְעָשִׂ֧יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make עַל־ <WH5921> on הַחֹ֛שֶׁן <WH2833> upon the breastplate שַֽׁרְשֹׁ֥ת <WH8331> chains גַּבְלֻ֖ת <WH1383> at the ends מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> work עֲבֹ֑ת <WH5688> [of] wreathen זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> gold טָהֽוֹר׃ <WH2889> [of] pure

וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <WH6213> And thou shalt make עַל־ <WH5921> on הַחֹ֔שֶׁן <WH2833> upon the breastplate שְׁתֵּ֖י <WH8147> two טַבְּע֣וֹת <WH2885> rings זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> of gold וְנָתַתָּ֗ <WH5414> and shalt put אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> the two הַטַּבָּע֔וֹת <WH2885> rings עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> on the two קְצ֥וֹת <WH7098> ends הַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <WH2833> of the breastplate

וְנָתַתָּ֗ה <WH5414> And thou shalt put אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> the two עֲבֹתֹ֣ת <WH5688> wreathen הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> [chains] of gold עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁתֵּ֖י <WH8147> in the two הַטַּבָּעֹ֑ת <WH2885> rings אֶל־ <WH413> at קְצ֖וֹת <WH7098> [which are] on the ends הַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <WH2833> of the breastplate

וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֤י <WH8147> And [the other] two קְצוֹת֙ <WH7098> ends שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> of the two הָעֲבֹתֹ֔ת <WH5688> wreathen תִּתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> [chains] thou shalt fasten עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> in the two הַֽמִּשְׁבְּצ֑וֹת <WH4865> ouches וְנָתַתָּ֛ה <WH5414> and put עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּתְפ֥וֹת <WH3802> [them] on the shoulderpieces הָאֵפֹ֖ד <WH646> of the ephod אֶל־ <WH413> about מ֥וּל <WH4136> it פָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וְעָשִׂ֗יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> two טַבְּע֣וֹת <WH2885> rings זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <WH7760> and thou shalt put אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> them upon the two קְצ֣וֹת <WH7098> ends הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <WH2833> of the breastplate עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׂפָת֕וֹ <WH8193> in the border אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אֶל־ <WH413> is toward עֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> thereof which [is] in the side הָאֵפֹ֖ד <WH646> of the ephod בָּֽיְתָה׃ <WH1004> inward

וְעָשִׂיתָ֮ <WH6213> thou shalt make שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> And two טַבְּע֣וֹת <WH2885> [other] rings זָהָב֒ <WH2091> of gold וְנָתַתָּ֣ה <WH5414> and shalt put אֹתָ֡ם <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> of שְׁתֵּי֩ <WH8147> them on the two כִתְפ֨וֹת <WH3802> sides הָאֵפ֤וֹד <WH646> of the ephod מִלְּמַ֙טָּה֙ <WH4295> underneath מִמּ֣וּל <WH4136> toward פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> the forepart לְעֻמַּ֖ת <WH5980> thereof over against מֶחְבַּרְתּ֑וֹ <WH4225> the [other] coupling מִמַּ֕עַל <WH4605> thereof above לְחֵ֖שֶׁב <WH2805> the curious girdle הָאֵפֽוֹד׃ <WH646> of the ephod

וְיִרְכְּס֣וּ <WH7405> And they shall bind אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֠חֹשֶׁן <WH2833> the breastplate [מִטַּבְּעֹתֹו כ] (מִֽטַּבְּעֹתָ֞יו <WH2885> rings ק) אֶל־ <WH413> by טַבְּעֹ֤ת <WH2885> by the rings הָאֵפֹד֙ <WH646> of the ephod בִּפְתִ֣יל <WH6616> with a lace תְּכֵ֔לֶת <WH8504> of blue לִֽהְי֖וֹת <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> above חֵ֣שֶׁב <WH2805> that [it] may be above the curious girdle הָאֵפ֑וֹד <WH646> of the ephod וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יִזַּ֣ח <WH2118> be not loosed הַחֹ֔שֶׁן <WH2833> and that the breastplate מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> from הָאֵפֽוֹד׃ <WH646> from the ephod
